newsitem.title: USA: SITEL to buy Exton Technology from Softmart.
newsitem.headline: SITEL to buy Exton Technology from Softmart.

text.p: SITEL Corp, which provides outsourced telephone-based customer service and sales programs, said Friday it will acquire Exton Technology Group from Softmart Inc, effective March 1, for an undisclosed amount of cash.
Exton, with annual revenues of about $13 million, provides telephone-based technical support on behalf of Internet service providers, software publishers and computer hardware manufacturers.
Exton operates from a new call center in Madison, Wis., which has 300 telephone workstations in operation.
